A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Watching the first time\, I left stunned and confused. “Is this where they’re going with SW?” I really wanted to like it and so I let the movie settle in my mind\, watched the reviews on YT come in and decided to watch it a second time. I came away feeling somewhat resolved in the movie\, but after going home\, I came away still feeling the same as the initial reaction. Not surprised by the drop in box office\, as word of mouth spread rapidly. As a fan\, I’d say it’s a nice movie but it misses in delivering to a common audience\, as is evident by the polarized ratings. If SW wants to get back it’s audiences\, new and old generations \, it needs to stay in the middle and find popular commonalities.
